languages.text: "Стоя за штурвалом и вглядываясь во тьму космоса... Ты чувствуешь себя так же одиноко среди тысяч звезд, как и я — среди своих собратьев".
"Standing at the helm, peering into the darkness of the cosmos... You feel as lonely among the stars as I do among my own kin."
languages.original_text: "Стоя за штурвалом и вглядываясь во тьму космоса... Ты чувствуешь себя так же одиноко среди тысяч звезд, как и я — среди своих собратьев".

traits.locale_text: "Standing at the helm, peering into the darkness of the cosmos... You feel as lonely among the stars as I do among my own kin."
"Standing at the helm, peering into the darkness of the cosmos... You feel as lonely among the stars as I do among my own kin."
"Standing at the helm, peering into the darkness of the cosmos... You feel as lonely among the stars as I do among my own kin."
"Standing at the helm, peering into the darkness of the cosmos... You feel as lonely among the stars as I do among my own kin."
"Standing at the helm, peering into the darkness of the cosmos... You feel as lonely among the stars as I do among my own kin."

languages.text: “站在指挥室里凝视黑暗的浩渺广宇……你漂泊于群星之中的孤独，恰如我与同类格格不入的孤独。”
languages.original_text: "Standing at the helm, peering into the darkness of the cosmos... You feel as lonely among the stars as I do among my own kin."

traits.locale_text: “站在指挥室里凝视黑暗的浩渺广宇……你漂泊于群星之中的孤独，恰如我与同类格格不入的孤独。”

languages.text: «De pie tras el timón, escudriñando la oscuridad del cosmos... Te sientes tan {mf|solo|sola} entre las estrellas como yo entre mi propia gente».
languages.original_text: "Standing at the helm, peering into the darkness of the cosmos... You feel as lonely among the stars as I do among my own kin."

traits.locale_text: «De pie tras el timón, escudriñando la oscuridad del cosmos... Te sientes tan {mf|solo|sola} entre las estrellas como yo entre mi propia gente».

languages.text: « Vous vous tenez à la proue, admirant l'obscurité du cosmos... Vous vous sentez aussi {mf|seul|seule} que moi lorsque je me trouve parmi mes semblables. »
languages.original_text: "Standing at the helm, peering into the darkness of the cosmos... You feel as lonely among the stars as I do among my own kin."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous tenez à la proue, admirant l'obscurité du cosmos... Vous vous sentez aussi {mf|seul|seule} que moi lorsque je me trouve parmi mes semblables. »

languages.text: "Am Steuer stehen, in die Dunkelheit des Kosmos hinausspähen ... Ihr fühlt Euch unter den Sternen genauso einsam wie ich unter meinen eigenen Leuten."
languages.original_text: "Standing at the helm, peering into the darkness of the cosmos... You feel as lonely among the stars as I do among my own kin."

traits.locale_text: "Am Steuer stehen, in die Dunkelheit des Kosmos hinausspähen ... Ihr fühlt Euch unter den Sternen genauso einsam wie ich unter meinen eigenen Leuten."

languages.text: 「舵を握り、宇宙の闇を覗き込む…星々の中で孤独を感じるのは、我が同族の中で孤独を感じるのと同じだ」
languages.original_text: "Standing at the helm, peering into the darkness of the cosmos... You feel as lonely among the stars as I do among my own kin."

traits.locale_text: 「舵を握り、宇宙の闇を覗き込む…星々の中で孤独を感じるのは、我が同族の中で孤独を感じるのと同じだ」

languages.text: "Dümenin başında kozmosun karanlığına göz gezdiriyorsun... Yıldızların arasında, tıpkı soydaşlarımın arasında hissettiğim gibi yalnız hissediyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Standing at the helm, peering into the darkness of the cosmos... You feel as lonely among the stars as I do among my own kin."

traits.locale_text: "Dümenin başında kozmosun karanlığına göz gezdiriyorsun... Yıldızların arasında, tıpkı benim soydaşlarımın arasında hissettiğim gibi yalnız hissediyorsun."
